name: Traditional German Food
description: Authentic German cuisine including bratwurst, sauerkraut, pretzels, and traditional German dishes served by local vendors.

name: German Beer Garden
description: Experience authentic German beer culture with traditional Hofbr√§u brews and local craft beers in our outdoor beer garden.

name: Live German Music
description: Traditional German music and polka performed by talented musicians including Don, featuring folk songs and contemporary favorites.

name: Family Activities
description: Kid-friendly activities including face painting, games, crafts, and entertainment suitable for all ages.

name: Cultural Parade
description: Traditional parade showcasing German culture, music, and community spirit with costumes, floats, and marching bands.

name: German Games & Competitions
description: Traditional German games including stein-holding contests, pretzel-eating competitions, and cultural trivia challenges.

name: Soccer Tournament
description: Community soccer tournament featuring teams from local German clubs and community organizations.

name: Cultural Workshops
description: Educational workshops on German culture, language basics, traditional crafts, and cooking demonstrations.

name: Vendor Marketplace
description: Local vendors selling German crafts, clothing, souvenirs, and traditional items from Germany and local artisans.

name: Community Social
description: Social gathering space for community members to meet, share stories, and celebrate German heritage together.
